all_declared_items.text: Make a difference Awards Event - BBC Radio Lancashire. Held at Blackpool Tower on the 21st September 2024. I was provided with afternoon tea and a trip to the top of the tower. Free drink tickets (1 per person) were provided but not used. I estimate the cost to be approximately £45. I paid my own transport costs. A £6 Blackpool Tower keyring was also included.
